org.egov.infra.web.struts.actions

Class SearchFormAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionSupport
      • org.egov.infra.web.struts.actions.BaseFormAction
        • org.egov.infra.web.struts.actions.SearchFormAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.Action, com.opensymphony.xwork2.interceptor.ParameterNameAware, com.opensymphony.xwork2.interceptor.ValidationAware, com.opensymphony.xwork2.LocaleProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.ModelDriven<Object>, com.opensymphony.xwork2.Preparable, com.opensymphony.xwork2.TextProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.Validateable, Serializable, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ParameterAware, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.RequestAware, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.SessionAware
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GenericWorkFlowAction

    public abstract class SearchFormAction
extends BaseFormAction
    Generic Search Form Action. Can be extended by any action class that intends to provide search functionality. Supports pagination. Extending class must implement the method SearchFormAction#prepareQuery() that prepares the query based on criteria entered by user, and returns an object of SearchQuery
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • setTableId

        public void setTableId(String tableId)
        Sets the display tag table id. This is used to create the param encoder. The param encoder is used to fetch data from encoded request parameters. The request parameters related to display tag are encoded in case the attribute "export" is set to true in the "display:table" tag.
        Parameters:
        tableId - The id of the display tag table (in "display:table" tag)

      • setPage

        public void setPage(int pageNum)
        Parameters:
        pageNum - the page number to set

      • getSearchResult

        public org.displaytag.pagination.PaginatedList getSearchResult()
        Returns:
        the search result

      • prepareQuery

        public abstract SearchQuery prepareQuery(String sortField,
                                         String sortOrder)
        Parameters:
        sortField - the field on which data is to be sorted. This will be same as the value of "property" attribute in display:column tag (when sortable=true and user clicks on the column to sort it). In case no sorting is required, this parameter will be passed as null.
        sortOrder - the sort order (asc/desc)
        Returns:
        the query to be used for fetching the search results.

      • search

        public String search()
        The Search action method. This will internally call the method SearchFormAction#prepareQuery() to get the query to be executed. It then executes the query and creates the paginated search result.
        Returns:
        success
